prompt:
The image captures the vibrant and culturally rich atmosphere of a Moroccan-style living room, bathed in natural light. Dominating the scene are large windows adorned with white curtains that allow glimpses of the world outside. The walls, constructed from earthy tones, serve as a canvas for intricate patterns in shades of blue and white, reminiscent of traditional Moroccan tiles.

The room is furnished with wooden chairs and tables, each meticulously crafted with intricate designs. These pieces are arranged around a large vase filled with fresh flowers, adding a touch of nature to the space. The overall visual aesthetic is one of tranquility and cultural richness, evoking a sense of nostalgia for traditional Moroccan architecture.
